about.title: About the Property
about.description: Discover this T3 apartment renovated in 2025, located in Parque das Nações, Lisbon.
about.longDescription:
With a total area of 172 sqm (143 sqm of gross area and 29 sqm of dependent area), the property stands out for its excellent natural light, peaceful surroundings, and nearby green leisure areas.
The apartment features a spacious living and dining room, a fully equipped kitchen with modern appliances, three bedrooms including a suite, and two bathrooms.
It also offers central heating and high-quality finishes, making it ideal for families or for those seeking comfort and quality of life.
Set in a prime location, close to public transport, shops, services, and green areas, it provides easy access to the main areas of the city.
Schedule your visit today and discover your new home in Parque das Nações.
